Key Match Events: Pete Alonso hit a clutch three-run homer to give the Mets a 3-2 lead in the top of the ninth inning, and then Starling Marte hit a single, scoring Jesse Winker for the insurance run.
Post-Match Reflections: Mets President of Baseball Operations David Stearns said 'we just saw one of the greatest games in Mets history' after their 4-2 Game 3 win against the Brewers.
Pete Alonso spoke to SNY after the game: 'Pete Alonso pictured with 'playoff pumpkin'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Empire State Building turned blue and orange after the Mets' win.
Brandon Nimmo found out that his grandmother, Claudine Nimmo, passed away prior to Game 3.
Others: The Mets won a 4-2 thriller against the Brewers to advance to the NLDS.
Game 1 of the NLDS is on Saturday at 4:08 p.m. ET at Citizens Bank Park.
